news_title: “Best ICO of 2024” DTX Exchange Jumps Ahead Of SUI and Cardano With $1M Raised in Last 24 Hours
news_content: Crypto Reporter Online magazine about cryptocurrencies, NFTs, DeFi, GameFi and other blockchain technologies October 30, 2024ByCrypto Reporter Cardano (ADA) founder has recently shown interest in collaborating with gaming companies following the launch of its Layer2 scaling solution Hydra. Amid this high-profile collaboration, SUI has made waves with a shocking surge in its trading volume. However, DTX Exchange (DTX) has outshined the status quo with its high-rising presale rally crossing 6.17 million. SUI has recently witnessed a mind-blowing growth from Transak – a global payment infrastructure provider. The company has seen an explosive 300% growth in transaction volumes within SUI wallet month-over-month (MoM) increase in September 2024. The rally continued into October, suggesting the surging demand for Transak’s crypto transaction solutions. After the SUI wallet filed integration with Transak, the users within the SUI blockchain have been facilitated with easy access to SUI tokens. The members have experienced an effortless entry into the SUI blockchain. In terms of performance metrics, SUI is trading at $1.98 today, with an 18.34% surge in the last 24 hours and a 24-hour trading volume of $1.21 billion. SUI analysts think the integration with Transak couldn’t have been done at a better time than now because SUI just secured major milestones, including $1 billion in total value locked (TVL) as well as surging its market cap to over $6 billion in October, etc. Given its rising numbers in the market, SUI is headed to higher gains in the upcoming bull run. Cardano (ADA) developers have stepped up to collaborate with Nintendo after successfully implementing ‘Doom’ on Cardano’s Hydra L2 solution. With the aim to take blockchain gaming to a new level, the founder Charles Hoskinson announced that Hydra’s next project will be a Nintendo emulator. In terms of crypto performance, Cardano (ADA) is trading at $0.34 today. As the L2 scalability solution, Hydra is Cardano (ADA)’s latest development. It was deployed to improve transaction efficiency and reduce delays. Moreover, Cardano (ADA) uses Hydra Heads or state channels to manage off-chain processes. Hydra enables faster transactions within the blockchain by handling transactions parallel. With the successful launch of Hydra on the Cardano (ADA) blockchain, developers implemented ‘Doom’ on it, welcoming Cardano (ADA) into blockchain gaming. Hydra’s decentralized model verifies each in-game action through smart contracts. So, whenever any player makes a move, be it running or shooting, it triggers a transaction on the Hydra chain. DTX Exchange (DTX)has shaken the crypto market following the dramatic surge in its skyrocketing presale in the last 24 hours. Within one day, this presale powerhouse has secured a whopping $1 million – accelerating its ongoing rally with flying numbers. With the surging demand among investors, DTX Exchange (DTX) is poised to dominate SUI in the near term. DTX Exchange (DTX) offers up to 1,000x leverage, distributed liquidity pools, non-custodial wallets, and no KYC Requirements to deliver a convenient and smooth trading experience. DTX Exchange leads traditional crypto trading platforms with its hybrid trading model that offers financial inclusion and endless possibilities for investors and traders alike. Following its eye-catching presale performance,DTX Exchange (DTX)has been listed as the ‘Best ICO of 2024.’ Investors have been witnessed leaving renowned cryptocurrency projects to buy emerging DTX tokens and gain massive profits as well as reduced trading fees, governance votes and proposals, and potential air drops in the future. As SUI and Cardano (ADA) show bullish signals amid the shifting market sentiment, DTX Exchange’s success as the best ICO of 2024 suggests a massive upcoming rally in the network.
